title: Firewall error after champ select
body:
I've been having this issue since i started playing, so have so many others it seems. I have taken so many steps to try and fix this issue but still no luck, added exceptions to my firewall, changed the inbound rules also, changed the SSL to TLS settings, deleted Logitech dlls from the league folders, run the repair, reinstalled league and even just turning off my firewall when trying to connect to a game.

its not a huge issue when starting up a game, one or two retries seem to get me into the match but if i for whatever reason disconnect during a match reconnecting takes me far too long and i receive an afk/abandonment notice. it didnt bother me before but now that i have a 20min wait time for my queues its getting ridiculous.

Please if anyone can help find a solution for me!


i also attached my network diagnostic results if that helps at all.


This is my first time posting, sorry for any grammatical errors.

replies.body:
No problem.

If you have any anti-virus, you should probably disable/uninstall that until you've found a fix as well.

Have you tried [flushing your IP/DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10)? Have you tried [disabling IP Helper](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq11)? Be warned, however, that disabling IP Helper will prevent your computer from using IPv6 technologies. Remember how to reactivate it, lest you need it in the future.

i have done both turning off my anti-virus and flush/renew DNS still does not help

i shall try disabling IP helping now thank you for the advice
Did that work out for you?
sadly it did not, im fairly sure some ports are blocked on my router
Why would that be? Are you the one who set up your internet connection?
sadly it didnt seem to help at all
I am having the same issue.
You're on the NA region, though. Have you checked the server status page for NA?

You said you "turn[ed] off" your anti-virus. Have you tried completely uninstalling it? Some anti-viruses edit your computer's settings, which don't even need them to be running to be in effect.

If that isn't working, look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). If you need any help with that, tell me what exactly it is and I'll explain it better.

Best of luck.
